title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Streamline Multi-Organization Billing with AWS Billing Transfer (COP366)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 账单转移简化多组织账单管理 (COP366)
abstract: Discover how Billing Transfer enables centralized billing and financial management across multiple AWS Organizations from a single account. This makes billing operations more efficient and scalable while ensuring individual management accounts retain complete security and governance autonomy over their AWS accounts. Billing Transfer also helps customers protect proprietary pricing data without compromising organizational independence, addressing both operational and compliance requirements for complex enterprise environments. Attendees will learn how to simplify their cross-organizational billing and cost management workflows using Billing Transfer.
abstract_cn: 了解账单转移如何实现从单个账户对多个AWS组织进行集中账单和财务管理。这使得账单操作更加高效和可扩展，同时确保各个管理账户对其AWS账户保持完整的安全和治理自主权。账单转移还帮助客户保护专有定价数据，而不会影响组织独立性，满足复杂企业环境的运营和合规要求。与会者将学习如何使用账单转移简化跨组织账单和成本管理工作流程。
